Key Match Events: Ruturaj Gaikwad ruled out of the first T20I due to a wrist injury, impacting India's batting lineup
Post-Match Reflections: The BCCI Medical Team is examining Ruturaj Gaikwad's wrist injury
Miscellaneous Highlights: Suryakumar Yadav and Deepak Chahar were already out of the series due to previous injuries
